Class Tiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tiles
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    drawing_framework.Animatable

    public class Tiles
extends java.lang.Object
implements drawing_framework.Animatable
    Class responsible for the movement of tiles, game level, and track of the score.
    Author:
    Riza Ozcelik

      Constructors

      Tiles()
      Tile constructor with no parameter.

      • draw

        public void draw(drawing_framework.AnimationCanvas canvas)
        Method that is responsible for the drawing of falling tile. It draws the tile bu traversing it unit by unit.
        Specified by:
        draw in interface drawing_framework.Animatable
        Parameters:
        canvas - : Canvas to be drawn.

      • drawAll

        public void drawAll(drawing_framework.AnimationCanvas canvas)
        Method that is responsible for the drawing of the piece that fell before. It draws the by traversing the boolean matrix (table) of TetrisGame
        Parameters:
        canvas - : Canvas to be drawn.

      • getMaxX

        public int getMaxX()
        Method that returns biggest x value of the units.
        Returns:
        : Biggest x value of the units of the tile.

      • getMinX

        public int getMinX()
        Method that returns smallest x value of the units.
        Returns:
        : Smallest x value of the units of the tile.

      • getMinY

        public int getMinY()
        Method that returns smallest y value of the units.
        Returns:
        : Smallest y value of the units of the tile.

      • canMoveRight

        public boolean canMoveRight()
        Method that checks if tile can move in the right direction.
        Returns:
        : If tile can go to the right.

      • canMoveLeft

        public boolean canMoveLeft()
        Method that checks if tile can move in the left direction.
        Returns:
        : If tile can go to the left.

      • canMoveDown

        public boolean canMoveDown()
        Method that checks if tile can move downwards. If tile cannot go down anymore, it calls landOp method.
        Returns:
        : If tile can fall.

      • control

        public boolean control(int i,
                       int j)
        Method that checks if another tile occupies the destination. It does it by traversing the TetrisGame's matrix(table). The direction is set by parameters.
        Parameters:
        i - : Downwards movement.
        j - : Rightward movement.
        Returns:
        : If another unit occupies destination of the tile.

      • landOp

        public void landOp()
        Method that is responsible for the operations after the tile fell. It sets the the position of the tile true in the matrix. Creates a new piece and add it to the game canvas.

      • move

        public void move(drawing_framework.AnimationCanvas canvas)
        Method that is mainly responsible for the movement of a tile. It checks if the tile can move in the given direction and moves is if it can. It also prints score and level on canvas. Calls checkTable and drawAll methods.
        Specified by:
        move in interface drawing_framework.Animatable

      • updateTable

        public void updateTable(int x)
        Method that updates matrix by starting from the given parameter. It copies the value of upper line to the current. It also increments deletedLine which helps the calculation of score.
        Parameters:
        x - : Line that updating starts.

      • checkTable

        public void checkTable()
        Method that checks if there is any line to be removed. It matrix has line with full of trues. It removes it. And calls updateMatrix method.

      • rotatable

        public boolean rotatable()
        Method that checks if the tile is rotatable. If the destination is filled by another unit or out of limits it returns false.
        Returns:
        : If the tile is rotatable.

      • rotate

        public void rotate(drawing_framework.AnimationCanvas canvas)
        Method that rotates the tile if it is rotatable.
        Parameters:
        canvas - : Canvas to be drawn.
